thread.title: Samsung, Huawei, Lenovo, Sony: At IFA 2015, Asian Manufacturers Take The Spotlight
thread.title_full: Samsung, Huawei, Lenovo, Sony: At IFA 2015, Asian Manufacturers Take The Spotlight - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Samsung, Huawei, Lenovo, Sony: At IFA 2015, Asian Manufacturers Take The Spotlight
text: BERLIN - No Google, no Apple, a little Microsoft and some Intel. With American corporations either not present at Europe's largest consumer electronics show, or with no great launches on schedule, IFA 2015 relies heavily on Asian manufacturers to get some media attention. Â»
